law.catch_line: NOTICE OF VIOLATION/REPEAT SAMPLING AND REPORTING.

structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

section.text: If sampling performed by a user indicates a violation, the user must notify the POTW Director immediately and not less than within twenty-four (24) hours of becoming aware of the violation. The user shall also repeat the sampling and analysis and submit the results of the repeat analysis to the POTW Director within thirty (30) days after becoming aware of the violation. If allowed by the [POTW Director}, the user is not required to resample:
